title: Comparisons
description: Used for site comparisons, such as products, cards, rooms, flights, etc.

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Tracked when an item is added to a comparison.

count.title: Count
count.description: Count of the total number of items being compared.

items.title: Items
items.description: An array of all item IDs/SKUs in the list of products.

removal.title: Removal
removal.description: Tracked when an item is removed from a comparison.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of comparison tool in use.

view.title: View
view.description: Tracked when a comparison page is viewed.

impressions.title: Impressions
impressions.description: Extension of the impressions data type.
